mapper.insert: insert into review_table (star, review_content, member_no, order_no, res_no, res_name, member_nickname) values (#{star}, #{review_content},#{member_no},#{order_no},#{res_no}, #{res_name}, #{member_nickname})
mapper.select: select * from review_table where member_no = #{member_no} order by reg_date desc
select * from review_table where res_no = #{res_no} order by reg_date desc
